import React from "react"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import { ImPointRight } from "react-icons/im"; function AboutCard() { return (

Hi Everyone, I am Xiaohai Wang from Guelph, Ontario.
I am currently specializing in Cybersecurity and Threat Intelligence.
I have pursued my education in Cybersecurity and Threat Intelligence, University of Guelph.

Apart from cybersecurity, some other activities that I love to do!

  • Penetration Testing
  • Writing Security Research Papers
  • Participating in CTFs

"Strive to enhance cybersecurity through ethical hacking and research!"

Xiaohai Wang
 ); } export default AboutCard;
